trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to an event.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma referência a um evento.

trans-unit.source: CodeEventReferenceExpression can be used to represent a reference to an event.
trans-unit.target: CodeEventReferenceExpression pode ser usado para representar uma referência a um evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> property specifies the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A>propriedade especifica o objeto que contém o evento.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.EventName%2A> property specifies the name of the event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"></xref> class using the specified target object and event name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"> </xref> classe usando o nome de evento e do objeto de destino especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> que indica o objeto que contém o evento.

trans-unit.source: The name of the event to reference.
trans-unit.target: O nome do evento para referência.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto que contém o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> que indica o objeto que contém o evento.
